name: nordpass
title: NordPass
description: Search through your NordPass passwords, credit cards, and secure notes directly from Raycast. Fast, secure, and encrypted local search.
author: mxkel

commands.name: search-credit-cards
commands.title: Search Credit Cards
commands.description: Search through your NordPass credit cards

commands.name: search-secure-notes
commands.title: Search Secure Notes
commands.description: Search through your NordPass secure notes

preferences.name: exportFilePath
preferences.title: Export File Path
preferences.description: Path to your NordPass CSV export file (e.g., ~/Downloads/nordpass-export.csv). Leave empty to auto-detect.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
